plugins.name: Markdown to Figma Layers
plugins.description:
About

Converts Markdown into layers in Figma. Supports tables. Click "Show example" in plugin UI. If sample markdown is generated, yours should work, too.


What's supported

Tables, links, inline styles (only bold and strikethrough), up to 4 Headings, ordered and unordered lists.


What's ahead

Styles customization, checkboxes, maybe images from url, table heading styles could be fixed, support of row-based tables


How to support

Plugin is only published because I like likes. Give a like, share a comment if you're feeling generous, it will make my day 😌


FAQ


Part of my content is not generated. What happened?

It stops generating exactly where it faces markdown that is not handled. It can be a block of code, checkbox, heading level 5+ or something like that. Post a comment and I'll add support unless it's heading level 10 or nested table or something obscure like that.


Can I customize styles?

Not yet, styles are tailored for my project. If you need customization, pls, leave a comment so I'll know it's needed and will do my best to allocate time.
plugins.tagline: Convert Markdown into Figma layers. Tables supported

plugins.name: Reset constraints
plugins.description:
Resetting constraints of all nested layers when you need to scale a complex object is painful. But not with this plugin. You no longer have to go through all the layers and frames one by one and dig in the settings panel. Save your time for creative tasks. Reset all constraints to Scale in a few clicks.


How to use:

  1. Select the object you want to scale.
  2. Run the plugin.
  3. Get down to scaling.

accepted.name: Icons8 Team
accepted.description: Free design resources and software. Crafting beautiful icons, illustrations, music, and photography for your projects.

plugins.tagline: Scale complex objects with no pain: reset all the nexted layers' constraints

plugins.name: FigMayo
plugins.description:
What is FigMayo?


FigMayo instantly converts any Figma library into a fully functional documentation reference website you can share with your team. All your styles, variables and components are included allowing stakeholders to browse and explore your design work.


Give developers the tools they need to inspect components & variables, copy styles and play with your variants and props. Easily add Storybook, Github markdown, code samples and more.


You get a single source of truth for your team that is automatically kept up to date.


How to create a documentation site using FigMayo

  1. In Figma, go to the plugin menu and open the FigMayo plugin
  2. Sign up for a free account on www.figmayo.com
  3. Grab your API key from from your FigMayo settings
  4. Paste your API key into the plugin
  5. Paste the share url of your Figma library into the plugin
  6. Click the sync library button


Why use FigMayo?

  1. Quickly share your components, styles and variables with non-figma users, it’s the perfect developer handoff.
  2. Instant setup - no manual time spent replicating information that exists in Figma.
  3. Stay in sync - updates from your libraries can be quickly synced with your site.
  4. Consolidate product knowledge from Figma & Github.


Reach us on:

  1. LinkedIn
  2. Slack Community

accepted.name: Gavin McFarland
accepted.description: Freelance Designer and Developer who loves making things

plugins.tagline: Convert your Figma libraries into documentation websites

plugins.name: Pagefleet
plugins.description:
The Purpose

Pagefleet is built to help you save time by instantly generating all necessary pages for your design project instead of having to create them one by one. It comes equipped with three diverse templates that have been tailored to suit small, medium, and large design projects. Whether you're working on a website design, mobile app or a robust e-commerce site, Pagefleet has got you covered. To add to its versatility, it includes a custom feature that allows you reuse and edit any of the prebuilt templates to match your requirements.


How to use Pagefleet


Quickstart

Begin by running the plugin. Under the 'Quickstart' tab, you can select the project type that resonates with your requirements. Upon selection, a pre-defined set of pages are generated instantly, setting the stage for you to dive into your project.


Custom

If you wish to customize one of the templates, navigate to the 'Custom' tab and select the template you'd like to reuse. Once your template is selected, you have the freedom to modify the names of the pages by simply clicking on them. After you've made your desired changes, click on 'Generate Pages' to produce your own custom set of pages.


Limitations

  • If you are running the plugin on a fresh Figma file, it will rename the current page you're at with the first name in the template.
  • If you already have a few pages setup, running the plugin will rename only the current page and append the rest of the pages below it.


Prebuilt Templates


Simple

⭐️ Cover

🧑🏻‍💻 Dev Ready

🤖 Prototypes

🌍 Designs

🧩 Components

🧪 Playground

🗑️ Design Junkyard


Intermediate

⭐️ Cover

🧑🏻‍💻 Dev Ready

🌍 Design Explorations

🤖 Prototypes

✅ Research

🧩 Components

📑 Templates & Resources

🧪 Playground

🗑️ Design Junkyard


Advanced

⭐️ Cover

✅ Goals

🧑🏻‍💻 Dev Ready

⮑ Phase 1

⮑ Phase 2

🧑🏻‍💻 Staging

. ⮑ Phase 1

⮑ Phase 2

🌍 Solution Explorations (Design)

⮑ Iteration 3

⮑ Iteration 2

⮑ Iteration 1

🤖 Prototypes

📄 Wireframes

—

or

plugins.tagline: Speed up your next design project setup in Figma.

plugins.name: Lingohub for Figma
plugins.description:
Localize all your Figma projects with Lingohub — all your texts, in one place!


With Lingohub, you can seamlessly localize any project, from web or mobile apps to games or websites. Our continuous translation management and streamlined workflows integrate effortlessly into your development process.


How it works with our Figma plugin

•Push text segments from Figma directly to Lingohub.

•Pull completed translations back into Figma and instantly preview your localized designs.

•Context is key: screenshots of your designs are automatically uploaded to Lingohub, eliminating the need to add them manually.


What you can do with Lingohub

•Collaborate with multiple teams on localization.

•Automate your software localization tasks.

•Translate with our powerful, feature-rich editor (term base, translation memory, quality checks, and more).


For more details on using the Figma plugin, see our Help Center article.


A paid Lingohub account is required to use the Figma plugin. We offer a 14-day free trial so you can experience all features. Need help? Contact our support or schedule a free demo.
plugins.tagline: You create, Lingohub translates

plugins.name: [Archived] 0 - Figma to GitHub
plugins.description:
[DEPRECATION WARNING]

This plugin is deprecated in favor of our visual builder. More information at https://0.engineering/ or email support@0.engineering


[OVERVIEW]

Publish changes in minutes, not months.


The 0 plugin syncs Figma variables with your codebase via GitHub. Link your GitHub account, choose a repository, and instantly publish design changes in code—driving your team's product development velocity.


Supported formats:

  1. CSS variables
  2. Typescript
  3. JSON


Roadmap:

  1. Support automated unit tests
  2. Support Figma styles
  3. Support new formats (Android, iOS, Flutter)


Need help? Contact our support team.
plugins.tagline: Sync Figma variables with your codebase

plugins.name: Themed
plugins.description:
Effortlessly switch between Light and Dark themes in Figma with just a single click! This plugin lets you leverage your design tokens using local or shared styles for seamless theme transitions.


Ensure you are following the same Name Token Convention. Ensure to create two folders called Light and Dark. Feel free to any subfolders you feel necessary ... just as long there is one for Light mode and Dark mode.


Example:

Light/Color100 -> Dark/Color100


How to use your Themed:

https://www.loom.com/share/bf36f3b1b3a44526bdd8b9a1e8a51e59



Using Local Styles:

In order use local styles be sure to setup local styles with the proper naming conventions.


Using Shared Styles:

Due to limitations in the Figma API we require you to provide an Access tokens and File Key.


Locating Figma Access tokens:

https://www.loom.com/share/89302449180d4de39748f6f8084fc5b1


Locating File Key:

https://www.loom.com/share/1a137ec463ee4510b0a79e5129e94e44



Once set up, enjoy one-click theme toggling and maintain design consistency across all your projects.
plugins.tagline: Seamlessly switch between Light & Dark themes using your own design tokens

plugins.name: SimpleStage
plugins.description:
Improve your client communication and speed up your website design process! SimpleStage gives you a single platform to collect content, design feedback, and website feedback.


Sync your files directly from Figma to SimpleStage and send them to your client or copywriters to provide content or leave design feedback.


Gather content from clients and stakeholders during the design process


Collecting content is one of the most difficult aspects of a creative project, but SimpleStage makes the process easier with content collection fields and automated client reminders.


  • Visual content entry
  • Customizable fields
  • Easily collaborate
  • Version history


Collect design feedback and collaborate quickly with clients


Sharing designs and collecting feedback from your clients is easy and fast with SimpleStage. Clients can comment and annotate on your uploaded design to give feedback directly on elements.


  • Speed up design review
  • Annotate designs
  • Communicate faster
  • Version history

accepted.name: SimpleStage
accepted.description:
Collaboration made Simple
The complete solution to communicate with your clients at every stage of the website creation process

plugins.tagline: Sync your Figma Screens with SimpleStage

plugins.name: Font Variables Maker
plugins.description:
Typical situation: you've been playing around with fonts and at some point it's too late and too tedious to clean things up manually.


This plugin will help you clean up your typography. All you have to do is select text layers (and the plugin will help you with this), click a button and everything will be automatically sorted. A set of variables is generated based on the fonts used in the file and applied to all selected text layers in an orderly fashion.


Want to apply only 4 of the 20 fonts used? No problem. Want to change fonts within frames only? Easy. Want to apply a specific font to all text layers without variables? Yes, please.


With a single click, you can add control and order to your file. This is the kind of result art directors expect from designers.

accepted.name: Max Tcvetkov
accepted.description:
Code, Design, Research.
Protein, Fat, Carbohydrates.

plugins.tagline: Convert your existing fonts to variables

Want to apply only 4 of the 20 fonts used? No problem. Want to change fonts within frames only? Easy. Want to apply a specific font to all text layers without variables? Yes, please.


With a single click, you can add control and order to your file. This is the kind of result art directors expect from designers.

plugins.name: FigNotes
plugins.description:
The simple plugin is designed to make note-taking in FigJam simple and quick. Writing text to describe a process or building a concept map can take a significant amount of time, especially during fast-paced sessions or workshops. With this plugin, you can add text and quickly place it in a random location within the visible canvas, allowing you to focus on input without worrying about positioning the text and saving you a couple of mouse clicks.


The plugin also includes commands that allow you to tidy up your notes or arrange them in a grid format for better organisation. 


Give it a try and see if it can make your work in FigJam more efficient. 


Hope you find it useful 🙏🏼

accepted.name: Saleh KAYYALI
accepted.description: Hey 👋🏼  I'm an interaction designer with a passion for nifty productivity tools.

plugins.tagline: An easy way to take rapid notes in FigJam

48753.name: FigNotes
48753.description:

plugins.name: Icon Docu
plugins.description:
Tired of your Figma frames looking like a Picasso painting gone wrong? Dive into the world of organized design with our Figma Fontastic Organizer plugin! 🎨


What's the magic? 🎩

  1. Font Finder: Can't find the "Inter" font? No worries! We'll let you know if it's missing in action.
  2. Frame Fixer: Automatically resizes your frames and sections, giving them the space they deserve.
  3. Component Commander: Rearranges components in a neat and tidy grid. Say goodbye to messy layouts!
  4. Documentation Dynamo: Extracts and displays the name and description of each component and component set. Plus, it keeps a count of how many were created or updated. Knowledge is power!
  5. Auto-Layout Lover: Applies auto-layout to component sets, ensuring they look their best.
  6. Resizer: Adjusts the size of sections to fit their children perfectly. No more guessing games!

How to use?

Just run the plugin and watch as your design transforms from chaotic to charismatic! 🌟


Note: This plugin works best with the "Inter" font in Regular style. Make sure you have it, or we'll give you a heads up!

Join the organized design revolution today! 🌐🔥


Disclaimer: Picasso is a legend, and we're just trying to be funny. No art was harmed in the making of this description. 😅
plugins.tagline: Automate Icon Documentation

65377.description:

  2. Frame Fixer: Automatically resizes your frames and sections, giving them the space they deserve.

plugins.name: AnnoDot
plugins.description:
AnnoDot is a flexible plugin that enhances your design workflow with dynamic, customizable annotations. The plugin allows designers to annotate their designs for better communication and clarity, with the flexibility to personalize their annotations for any project or need.


Each annotation can be edited post-creation within the plugin, ensuring information remains accurate and up-to-date. AnnoDot's refresh feature automatically updates annotation counts (at the push of a button) as designs evolve, eliminating confusion by maintaining unique identifiers for each note.


Key Highlights:


• Dynamic Annotation Creation: Easily create and edit annotations directly in your Figma designs for clear communication.


• Customizable Annotation Frames: Adjust frames to suit your project needs by choosing exactly what information to include in each annotation.


• Annotation Count Refresh: Keep your annotation numbers unique and updated as frames are added or removed, avoiding duplicates at the push of a button.


• Advanced Color Customization: Tailor the background and text colors of the annotation dot and its numbering for seamless design integration.


• Visual Tags: Use a default tag for development, bug, flow, or accessibility to quickly identify the tag or add personalized tags to your annotations, choosing your label, background, and text/border colors for distinct visibility.


• Enhanced Design Clarity: Improve your design workflow with informative and aesthetically pleasing annotations, which will enhance team communication and project understanding.


This was done as a passion project. I’m a designer who likes to dabble in coding. Please reach out with any issues you encounter, and I will do my best to update the plugin accordingly.
plugins.tagline: Annotate, Customize, Refresh: Design Clarity Made Easy

plugins.name: Foundation
plugins.description:
Foundation

Never start a design system from scratch again. Foundation instantly generates Figma variables that perfectly match Tailwind CSS, turning hours of setup into seconds.


📹 Getting started

https://youtu.be/mXGzHx-o9Hg?si=PKeVHjxs4FKw7eTh


🎯 What it does

Foundation is your design system accelerator. It automatically creates a complete set of Figma variables based on Tailwind CSS, giving you a production-ready foundation in seconds. Perfect for new projects, MVPs, or standardizing existing design systems.


Core Features

🎨 Colors that scale

- Start with brand colors, get a complete system

- Dark mode ready

- Interactive states included

- Semantic color system with:

• Surface colors

• Content colors

• Border colors

• Status colors

• All with dark mode variants


📐 Smart spacing

- Based on your root font size

- Matches Tailwind's spacing scale

- Complete system for:

• Layout spacing

• Component spacing

• Typography spacing

• All mathematically connected


✍️ Typography system

- Production-ready type scale

- Weights from light to bold

- Letter spacing variations

- Line heights that work

- Ready-to-use text styles


🔲 Border system

- Radius scale from none to full

- Border widths that make sense

- Works with your spacing


🚀 Quick Start

1. Install Foundation

2. Set your brand colors

3. Set your root font size

4. Generate your system

5. Start designing


💎 What You Get


A complete design system foundation:

- 🎨 Color system with dark mode

- 📏 Production-ready spacing

- 📝 Complete typography

- 🔲 Border system


Perfect For:

- 🆕 Starting new design systems

- 🏃‍♂️ Rapid prototyping & MVPs

- 🔄 Design system migrations

- 🤝 Figma + Tailwind teams

- ⚡️ Fast-paced projects


Why Foundation?

- 🚀 Complete system in seconds

- ⏱ Skip weeks of setup

- ✅ Proven design patterns

- 🔄 Perfect code sync

- 📈 Built to scale


Don't waste time building design systems from scratch. Get a production-ready foundation in seconds.

accepted.name: Square One
accepted.description: Creating digital products and brands together with you 🤘

accepted.name: Dylan de Heer
accepted.description: Digital Product Designer & Co-Founder of Square One.

plugins.tagline: Generate Figma variables based on Tailwind CSS utilities.

plugins.name: Numcraft
plugins.description:
Generate realistic data instantly for your design mockups and prototypes. From numbers, IDs to phone numbers, dates, and timestamps - populate your designs with data in just a few clicks.


Features:

* Generate sequential or random numbers in any format

* Generate sequential or random IDs in any format

* Create realistic phone numbers for any region

* Insert dates in multiple formats (MM/DD/YYYY, DD-MM-YY, etc.)

* Add timestamps and time strings for scheduling interfaces

* Batch generate data across multiple layers

* Customize formats to match your project needs


Stop using placeholder text like "123" or "XX-XX-XXXX". Make your designs feel authentic with real-looking data that matches production environments.


Perfect for:

* Any design that needs realistic data structure

* Amounts

* User profiles and contact lists

* Transaction histories

* Event schedules and calendars

* Order tracking interfaces


Save time and bring your mockups closer to the final product with just one click.
plugins.tagline: Generate numbers for your projects easily

plugins.name: 글자 수 세기
plugins.description:
선택한 프레임 또는 텍스트 레이어의 글자 수를 셀 수 있는 플러그인입니다.

한글/영문 모두 1자로 계산하며, 특수문자나 기호 역시 1자로 계산합니다.

plugins.name: Theme Engine
plugins.description:
Theme Engine allows you to use Google's Material 3 Dynamic Color to build your own accessible color themes using the HCT (hue, chroma, tone) color space and automate generation of variables and aliases to the variable collection of your choice.


Plugin Github: https://github.com/pbroom/theme-engine


Note:

This is the first release, so any feedback or bug reports are welcome. While I feel it's far from finished, I think it's to the point where it can be of use and help certain users save some time building out accessible color systems. Here are some features in no particular order that I'd like to work on next:

  • Bind variables to styles
  • Variable overwrite control
  • Other color spaces like HSL, HSB, etc.
  • WCAG contrast helper utilities


Credits:

Science of Color Design

How Dynamic Color Works

material-color-utilities

create-figma-plugin by Yuanqing
plugins.tagline: Build color systems at scale.

plugins.name: Reset instances
plugins.description:
Reset the following properties of instances without having to reset the media and text content. Works with variables.


Everything except content

Outermost layer without content (nested instances will not be reset)

Select properties to reset


Dimensions (Width, height, or min/max dimensions)

Fit

Padding

Item spacing

Corner radius

Visibility

Modes

Typography


Note: The processing of instances will take more time to complete the larger the instances are. Hidden layers within the instances will also be processed. It is recommended to not run the plugin on more than 1 complex instance – the plugin will timeout in 15 minutes.


This plugin does not reset texts, fills and strokes as they are supported natively in Figma via the overflow button next to the component panel.


Source code here.
plugins.tagline: Reset instances without resetting media and text content

67250.description:

67250.release_notes: – Fixed a bug when resetting only the outermost layer
67250.tagline: Reset instances without resetting media and text content

plugins.name: Color Contrast
plugins.description:
Measure color contrast using the APCA, BPCA, and WCAG 2 algorithms.


Inspect Mode:

  1. Select any layer—preferably text, but frame, group, component, or instance layers also work—to automatically extract the color.
  2. Alternatively, you can manually input the color.
  3. The calculated contrast value will be displayed below.
  4. Click the "Show conformance" button at the bottom to view the WCAG conformance for the selected contrast.


Audit Mode:

  1. Select the frame to run the audit for and click run audit button.
  2. The plugin lists any contrast violations for both normal and large text.
  3. WCAG2 is the default algorithm, but you can switch to other contrast algorithm.
  4. In the list, you can click on any row to focus that layer on the canvas, you can shift + click on any row to open that layer in the inspect mode.


If you aren't familiar with the BPCA or APCA algorithms, check out this article Color contrast, a deep dive.
plugins.tagline: Measure color contrast using APCA, BPCA, WCAG 2 algorithms

113100.name: Color Contrast
113100.description:
Measure color contrast using the APCA, BPCA, and WCAG 2 algorithms.

  2. Alternatively, you can manually input the color.
  3. The calculated contrast value will be displayed below.
  4. Click the "Show conformance" button at the bottom to view the WCAG conformance for the selected contrast.


Audit Mode:

  1. Select the frame to run the audit for and click run audit button.
  2. The plugin lists any contrast violations for both normal and large text.

  4. In the list, you can click on any row to focus that layer on the canvas, you can shift + click on any row to open that layer in the inspect mode.

113100.tagline: Measure color contrast using APCA, BPCA, WCAG 2 algorithms

plugins.name: Set Instance Property as Name
plugins.description:
All the child components taken out from the component set in Figma will inherit the name of the component set.

This plugin provides the functionality to use the attribute values of the child components as their names.
plugins.tagline: Rename child components based on their component attributes.

96442.name: Set Instance Property as Name
96442.description:
All the child components taken out from the component set in Figma will inherit the name of the component set.

This plugin provides the functionality to use the attribute values of the child components as their names.
96442.release_notes:
1. New interactive methods and UI design for a smoother experience.
2. Support for choosing whether to name in key-value pairs.
3. Ability to filter properties available for renaming, as well as one-click reset.
4. Dark mode adaptation.
96442.tagline: Rename child components based on their component attributes.

plugins.name: Unfolding Variable
plugins.description:
Hello, I'm Kan, a Thai UX/UI Designer. This plugin is designed to make sharing design tokens a breeze. Feel free to give it a try and let me know what you think. Your feedback is valuable to me!


Highlights

  1. Generate token documents or JSON file effortlessly with a single click.
  2. Instantly unfold all tokens in your local variable into a detailed table.
  3. Get a lightning-fast overview of your local variable settings.
  4. Streamline your development process by converting local variables into highly usable JSON formats.
plugins.tagline: Generate token documents effortlessly with a single click.

97769.name: Unfolding Variable
97769.description:

  2. Instantly unfold all tokens in your local variable into a detailed table.
  3. Get a lightning-fast overview of your local variable settings.

97769.release_notes: Updated UI and added a new feature to convert local variables to JSON format.
97769.tagline: Generate token documents effortlessly with a single click.

plugins.name: Loom Card
plugins.description:
Enhance your design collaboration with Loom videos! 🚀

This plugin allows you to easily integrate Loom videos directly into your Figma files. Simply paste the Loom video URL into the plugin window, click "Add," and a beautifully designed card with the video's details (title, thumbnail, and link) will be added to your canvas. Perfect for sharing explanations, walkthroughs, or visual feedback!


Features:


📋 Paste a Loom video URL and generate a preview card

🖼️ Automatically fetch video details like title and thumbnail

🤝 Embed video links directly into your Figma projects for better collaboration
plugins.tagline: Add Loom videos to your Figma designs effortlessly! 🎥✨

116385.name: Loom Card
116385.description:
Enhance your design collaboration with Loom videos! 🚀

This plugin allows you to easily integrate Loom videos directly into your Figma files. Simply paste the Loom video URL into the plugin window, click "Add," and a beautifully designed card with the video's details (title, thumbnail, and link) will be added to your canvas. Perfect for sharing explanations, walkthroughs, or visual feedback!


Features:


📋 Paste a Loom video URL and generate a preview card

🖼️ Automatically fetch video details like title and thumbnail

🤝 Embed video links directly into your Figma projects for better collaboration
116385.release_notes:
Update Notes 🆕✨

🚀 New Feature: Now you can update your Loom card! Just select the card and click "Update Loom Card" in the properties panel for a seamless refresh.

🐛 Bug Fixes: We've squashed some pesky bugs to make your experience smoother!

Keep your workflow efficient and hassle-free! 💡
116385.tagline: Add Loom videos to your Figma designs effortlessly! 🎥✨

plugins.name: Figma User Generator
plugins.description:
Figma User Generator

Herramienta diseñada para generar perfiles de usuario con información pseudo realista y estructurada, lista para ser utilizada en tus diseños y prototipos en Figma.

Ya sea que estés trabajando en investigación de usuarios, creando mockups de producto o diseñando interfaces interactivas, este plugin te permite agregar perfiles con un solo clic, ahorrándote tiempo y facilitando tu flujo de trabajo. ✨


Características Principales

  1. Generación Automática de Perfiles: Obtén nombres, ubicaciones, emails, teléfonos y más, con datos basados en randomuser.me.
  2. Avatares Realistas: Cada perfil incluye una imagen de usuario en alta calidad.
  3. Tarjetas de Usuario en Figma: Inserta el perfil generado como una tarjeta con datos organizados y diseño optimizado.


¿Cómo usarlo?

  1. Selecciona un género (masculino, femenino o aleatorio).
  2. Genera un perfil y visualiza su información en la tarjeta previa.
  3. Envía el perfil a Figma y se insertará automáticamente en tu archivo como una tarjeta estructurada.
plugins.tagline: Generar perfiles de usuario  pseudo realista  y estructurada, lista para ser utilizada.

120820.name: Figma User Generator
120820.description:
Figma User Generator

Herramienta diseñada para generar perfiles de usuario con información pseudo realista y estructurada, lista para ser utilizada en tus diseños y prototipos en Figma.

Ya sea que estés trabajando en investigación de usuarios, creando mockups de producto o diseñando interfaces interactivas, este plugin te permite agregar perfiles con un solo clic, ahorrándote tiempo y facilitando tu flujo de trabajo. ✨


Características Principales

  1. Generación Automática de Perfiles: Obtén nombres, ubicaciones, emails, teléfonos y más, con datos basados en randomuser.me.
  2. Avatares Realistas: Cada perfil incluye una imagen de usuario en alta calidad.
  3. Tarjetas de Usuario en Figma: Inserta el perfil generado como una tarjeta con datos organizados y diseño optimizado.


¿Cómo usarlo?

  1. Selecciona un género (masculino, femenino o aleatorio).
  2. Genera un perfil y visualiza su información en la tarjeta previa.
  3. Envía el perfil a Figma y se insertará automáticamente en tu archivo como una tarjeta estructurada.
120820.tagline: Generar perfiles de usuario  pseudo realista  y estructurada, lista para ser utilizada.

plugins.name: Noise Effect Generator
plugins.description:
Noise Effect Generator is a powerful Figma plugin that helps designers easily add high-quality noise and texture effects to layers.

Key Features:

• Multiple noise types: Particle Flow, Striped, Radial Waves, Maze, Spots, Fiber, Pixelated, Diffusion, Waveform, and Geometric

• Rich adjustment options: frequency, amplitude, density, rotation, and many other parameters

• Amplitude effect adjustments: Normal, Ridge, Wave, Contrast, and Threshold

• Geometry types: Triangle, Square, Circle, Diamond, Line, and Dot

• Highly customizable color mapping system with gradient support

• 15 beautiful preset templates you can apply with one click

• Real-time preview - what you see is what you get

• Multi-language support (Chinese, English, and Japanese)

Whether you want to add texture to illustrations, add depth to backgrounds, or create unique artistic effects, the Noise Effect Generator plugin makes it easy.
plugins.tagline: Add high-quality noise, textures and artistic effects to your designs

124356.name: Noise Effect Generator
124356.description:
Noise Effect Generator is a powerful Figma plugin that helps designers easily add high-quality noise and texture effects to layers.

plugins.name: LTR to RTL - Pro
plugins.description:
A Gift for Tuwaiq Academy Designers


Mastering RTL and LTR layouts just got easier! This plugin is designed to streamline your workflow and overcome the challenges of right to left UI design.


Features:

One-Click Frame Flipping: Instantly mirror entire pages or selected frames.

Effortless Text Alignment: Flip all text in a page or only selected text elements.

Translation (Coming Soon!) Seamlessly translate content for true localization.


Say goodbye to tedious manual adjustments and hello to time-saving design!


IMPORTANT NOTES:

Plugin doesn't support components yet, you have to detatch instence first.


This plugin is fit for ui localization for the following languages :


Arabic

Aramaic.

Azeri.

Dhivehi/Maldivian.

Hebrew.

Kurdish (Sorani)

Persian/Farsi.

Urdu.


if you notice any bugs or issues kindly contact us at:

hello@builtinriyad.com


creator website:

www.builtinriyad.com
plugins.tagline: Seamlessly flip your UI designs for right-to-left languages with this powerful plugin

plugins.name: Create Icon Sets
plugins.description:
Create Icon Sets


It's dead simple.

select frames -> run the plugin -> save hours.


neatly organizes the component sets and sorts them alphabetically.


How it works:

frame names *must* include at least one / , \ or : and anything before is used to group the components.


arrow-right/filled

arrow-right/outline


arrow-left:filled

arrow-left:outline


arrow-left\filled

arrow-left\outline


gets combined into arrow-right component set with the property values "filled" and "outline"


Support & Feature Request

Find me on X -> @0xa3k5

Create a new issue on -> Github
plugins.tagline: combine thousands of icons as component sets in one go

91843.description:

plugins.name: Pixel perfect (Beta)
plugins.description:
Pixel perfect: precision alignment made easy


Instantly align your designs to the pixel grid with a single click. This plugin fine-tunes the position and size of selected elements, ensuring crisp, clean layouts without manual adjustments.


Key features:

• Recursively applies adjustments to selected layers and all their descendants

• Aligns object positions and dimensions to whole pixels

• Rounds stroke widths to the nearest 0.5 pixel

• Respects auto layout constraints

• Adjusts corner radii for pixel-perfect curves

• Preserves your design intent while enhancing clarity


Achieve pixel-perfect designs effortlessly, saving time and maintaining consistency across your projects. Ideal for UI designers who value precision and clean visual output in their work.
plugins.tagline: Make any design pixel perfect with a single command.

102072.name: Pixel perfect (Beta)
102072.description:

• Preserves your design intent while enhancing clarity


Achieve pixel-perfect designs effortlessly, saving time and maintaining consistency across your projects. Ideal for UI designers who value precision and clean visual output in their work.
102072.release_notes:
- Simplified the plugin so no extra options is needed to run it.
- Running it now will fix the selected frames and all contents.
102072.tagline: Make any design pixel perfect with a single command.

plugins.name: DBuilder Email
plugins.description:
E.DSekon.com

Video Tutorials

Free Templates


Its Free


Features


  1. Easily create email designs using a wide variety of common components provided.
  2. Establish your own personalized and reusable Figma component library using the design tools included.
  3. Customize text, images, styles, and auto-layout settings effortlessly within Figma.
  4. Define responsive design modifications for mobile devices for each layer with ease.
  5. Preview your HTML email on various device sizes directly within the plugin.
  6. Utilize Google Fonts with fallback options for clients that don't support them.
  7. No coding skills required; export responsive, production-ready HTML with a single click.
  8. Seamlessly integrate with popular email platforms like SendPulse, Brevo.
  9. Download the exported .zip file to your computer directly from Figma for your convenience.
  10. The plugin features translation support.
plugins.tagline: Builds html emails automatically with just a single click - using the DEmail Builder.

plugins.name: FrameShot
plugins.description: Introducing FrameCapture, the Figma plugin that elegantly solves the age-old issue of exporting frames with incomplete context. With FrameCapture, select an object and voila - effortlessly extract the entire frame, including all layers nested beneath it, for seamless export as an image or in any other format of your choice. Don't compromise on image quality, and capture the complete picture with FrameCapture - the ultimate solution for designers and creators alike.
plugins.tagline: Capture the selected frame and everything under it

50867.name: FrameShot
50867.description: Introducing FrameCapture, the Figma plugin that elegantly solves the age-old issue of exporting frames with incomplete context. With FrameCapture, select an object and voila - effortlessly extract the entire frame, including all layers nested beneath it, for seamless export as an image or in any other format of your choice. Don't compromise on image quality, and capture the complete picture with FrameCapture - the ultimate solution for designers and creators alike.
50867.tagline: Capture the selected frame and everything under it

plugins.name: Text Variable Generator
plugins.description:
Are you tired of manually creating text variables for your projects? 🤯 Introducing the Text Variables Generator plugin! 🚀


This handy tool allows you to effortlessly generate text variables by selecting any group, frame, or element containing text. With a simple click of the "Create Text Variables" button, your text variables are automatically generated, streamlining your workflow and saving you valuable time. ⏰


Say goodbye to manual text variable creation – let the Text Variables Generator do the work for you! 😃
plugins.tagline: Generate Text Variables Automatically

plugins.name: Charts builder
plugins.description:
Create charts using this simple and intuitive plugin


The charts builder plugin lets you edit and configure the following:

  1. number of datasets
  2. length of dataset
  3. title
  4. subtitle
  5. legend
  6. scales
  7. grid


❗ Right now the plugin allows only the use of the bar chart


Data can be generated randomly or from Google Sheets using a sheet formatted like this by selecting Data Source gsheets and filling with a google sheet URL of the page by going to Share => General Access => Anyone with the link => Copy link on the sheet you want represented as a chart. After you fill the link, press the "Load sheet data" button.
plugins.tagline: Create beautiful looking charts with just a few clicks

119918.name: Charts builder
119918.description:
Create charts using this simple and intuitive plugin


The charts builder plugin lets you edit and configure the following:

  1. number of datasets
  2. length of dataset
  3. title
  4. subtitle
  5. legend
  6. scales
  7. grid


❗ Right now the plugin allows only the use of the bar chart


Data can be generated randomly or from Google Sheets using a sheet formatted like this by selecting Data Source gsheets and filling with a google sheet URL of the page by going to Share => General Access => Anyone with the link => Copy link on the sheet you want represented as a chart. After you fill the link, press the "Load sheet data" button.
119918.release_notes: - fix line chart scales color bug
119918.tagline: Create beautiful looking charts with just a few clicks

plugins.name: Iso All
plugins.description:
Iso All seems to be a tool or feature that simplifies the creation of isometric designs. Here's a breakdown of its capabilities based on the provided information:


Key Features:

Automatic Isometric Layer Creation: Eliminates the manual setup process for isometric layers.

Versatile Transformation: Allows you to convert various elements like frames, groups, text, and shapes into isometric perspectives.

Batch Processing: Enables simultaneous transformation of multiple elements, enhancing efficiency.

Benefits:

Time-Saving: Automates a complex process, saving users valuable time.

Flexibility: Offers a wide range of elements that can be converted to isometric.

Efficiency: Handles multiple transformations at once, improving workflow.

In essence, Isometric is a tool designed to streamline the creation of isometric designs by automating tasks and providing flexibility in element transformation.


Would you like to know more about specific use cases or how Isometric compares to other similar tools?
